reviewText: I bought this to use on the days that I don't do weights.  It's wonderful.  When you first view it you'll think that the exercises are so easy it can't possibly do anything.  Surprise!  It's very thorough.  You really get a good workout.  Sarah keeps you going for almost a full hour and you really feel good when you're done.  I've tried so many exercise tapes, but this is one I really like.  I just wish she would do another one.
